channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- menu shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- menu shortcode

item.title: CVE-2023-0395|2024-08-02T05:10:55.956Z -- unknown -- menu%20shortcode
item.description: The menu shortcode WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
